title: Replace all occurrences of “24000 MT” with “6000 MT” in site content

requirements.text: Update the centralized site content so the production-per-year value is changed from “24000 MT” to “6000 MT”, and ensure the updated value appears everywhere it is rendered (e.g., Home stats section and About page text/stats).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts` has `about.productionPerYear` set to exactly `6000 MT` (replacing `24000 MT`).
Home page stats section displays `6000 MT` for “Production Per Year”.
About page body text and About page stats display `6000 MT` for annual production/production capacity.
A repo-wide check confirms there are no remaining user-facing occurrences of the exact string `24000 MT`.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No design/layout changes beyond updating the production-per-year text value.
No backend changes (the site content is static and client-editable via frontend config).
